Package ru.nsu.fit.smolyakov.pizzeria.customer

Class RandomFrequentCustomerImpl

java.lang.Object
ru.nsu.fit.smolyakov.pizzeria.customer.RandomFrequentCustomerImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
Customer, RandomFrequentCustomer
public class RandomFrequentCustomerImpl extends Object implements RandomFrequentCustomer
An implementation of RandomFrequentCustomer interface. May be instantiated by RandomFrequentCustomerFactory.instance(OrderDescription, PizzeriaCustomerService, int).

  • Constructor Details

    • RandomFrequentCustomerImpl

      public RandomFrequentCustomerImpl(ScheduledExecutorService executor, OrderDescription orderDescription, PizzeriaCustomerService pizzeriaCustomerService, int maxPeriodMillis)
      Constructs an instance of RandomFrequentCustomerImpl.
      Parameters:
      executor - an executor to put tasks into
      orderDescription - a description of performed repeated orders
      pizzeriaCustomerService - a pizzeria to order pizza in
      maxPeriodMillis - a frequency with whom orders will be performed by start(int) method.

  • Method Details

    • order

      public void order()
      Makes an order in this RandomFrequentCustomer's favourite pizzeria.

      Prints to System.out when a regular order is made, either successfully or not.

      Specified by:
      order in interface Customer

    • start

      public void start(int times)
      Starts ordering a specified amount of pizzas with a period that is in range between 0 and maxPeriodMillis, specified in constructor.

      This method reuses order() method.

      All orders are processed in separated tasks which are to be executed by executor specified in RandomFrequentCustomerImpl(ScheduledExecutorService, OrderDescription, PizzeriaCustomerService, int) constructor.

      Specified by:
      start in interface RandomFrequentCustomer
      Parameters:
      times - amount of times to order
